description.zh-cn: 明英宗朱祁镇的嫡后。在土木堡之变后，因思念被俘的丈夫而日夜哭泣，导致一腿残疾、一目失明。明英宗复辟后，不顾其无子且伤残，坚持册立其为皇后。逝世后，在大学士李贤、彭时等人的力争下，得以与英宗合葬于明裕陵。
description.en: The empress consort of Emperor Yingzong of Ming. After the Tumu Crisis, she cried day and night for her captured husband, which resulted in a crippled leg and blindness in one eye. After Emperor Yingzong's restoration, he insisted on reinstating her as empress despite her being childless and disabled. After her death, thanks to the efforts of grand secretaries like Li Xian and Peng Shi, she was buried with Emperor Yingzong in the Yuling Mausoleum.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第六及第八位皇帝。在土木堡之变中被瓦剌俘虏，后被其弟景泰帝软禁于南宫，最终通过夺门之变成功复辟。
description.en: The sixth and eighth emperor of the Ming dynasty. He was captured by the Oirats in the Tumu Crisis, later placed under house arrest by his brother, the Jingtai Emperor, and eventually regained the throne through the Duomen Coup.

description.zh-cn: 孝庄睿皇后之父，官至中军都督府都督同知。
description.en: Father of Empress Xiaozhuangrui, who served as a commander-in-chief in the Chief Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 孝庄睿皇后之祖父，官至指挥使。
description.en: Grandfather of Empress Xiaozhuangrui, who served as a commander.

description.zh-cn: 孝庄睿皇后之兄，在土木堡之变中随驾阵亡。
description.en: Brother of Empress Xiaozhuangrui, who died accompanying the emperor in the Tumu Crisis.

description.zh-cn: 孝庄睿皇后之兄，任锦衣卫佥事，在土木堡之变中随驾阵亡。
description.en: Brother of Empress Xiaozhuangrui, served as an officer of the Jinyiwei, and died accompanying the emperor in the Tumu Crisis.

description.zh-cn: 钱钟之子，孝庄睿皇后的侄子。
description.en: Son of Qian Zhong and nephew of Empress Xiaozhuangrui.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第五位皇帝，明英宗之父。
description.en: The fifth emperor of the Ming dynasty, father of Emperor Yingzong.

description.zh-cn: 明宣宗的第二任皇后，明英宗之母。她与张太皇太后一同册立钱氏为皇后。
description.en: The second empress of Emperor Xuanzong and the mother of Emperor Yingzong. She, along with Grand Empress Dowager Zhang, selected Lady Qian to be the empress.

description.zh-cn: 明英宗在亲征瓦剌过程中，因指挥失误导致明军主力被歼，英宗本人被俘的军事事件。
description.en: A military event where the main force of the Ming army was annihilated and Emperor Yingzong himself was captured due to command errors during his personal campaign against the Oirats.

description.zh-cn: 明朝时期的蒙古部落。在土木堡之变中俘虏了明英宗。
description.en: A Mongol tribe during the Ming dynasty. They captured Emperor Yingzong in the Tumu Crisis.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第七位皇帝，明英宗之弟。在兄长被俘后即位，后将返回的英宗软禁于南宫。
description.en: The seventh emperor of the Ming dynasty, younger brother of Emperor Yingzong. He ascended the throne after his brother's capture and later placed the returned Emperor Yingzong under house arrest in the Southern Palace.

description.zh-cn: 指明代宗病重时，明英宗发动的宫廷政变，成功复辟并重登皇位。
description.en: Refers to the palace coup launched by Emperor Yingzong when the Jingtai Emperor was critically ill, resulting in Yingzong's successful restoration to the throne.

description.zh-cn: 明英宗的贵妃，明宪宗的生母。在儿子即位后被尊为皇太后，曾阻挠孝庄睿皇后与英宗合葬。
description.en: A consort of Emperor Yingzong and the birth mother of Emperor Xianzong. She was honored as Empress Dowager after her son's accession and attempted to prevent Empress Xiaozhuangrui from being buried with Emperor Yingzong.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第九位皇帝，明英宗与孝肃皇后之子。
description.en: The ninth emperor of the Ming dynasty, son of Emperor Yingzong and Empress Xiaosu.

description.zh-cn: 明朝太监，曾试图讨好周贵妃，传谕独尊其为皇太后，而排除钱氏。
description.en: A eunuch of the Ming dynasty who, in an attempt to curry favor with Consort Zhou, issued an edict to honor her as the sole Empress Dowager, excluding Lady Qian.

description.zh-cn: 明朝大学士，在钱、周二后并尊问题上据理力争，并最终确保孝庄睿皇后能与英宗合葬。
description.en: A Grand Secretary of the Ming dynasty who argued forcefully on the issue of co-equal status for Empresses Dowager Qian and Zhou, and ultimately ensured Empress Xiaozhuangrui was buried with Emperor Yingzong.

description.zh-cn: 明朝大学士，与李贤一同力争钱、周二后并尊。
description.en: A Grand Secretary of the Ming dynasty who, along with Li Xian, argued for the co-equal status of Empresses Dowager Qian and Zhou.

description.zh-cn: 明十三陵之一，是明英宗朱祁镇和孝庄睿皇后、孝肃皇后的合葬陵寝。
description.en: One of the Ming Tombs, the joint mausoleum of Emperor Yingzong Zhu Qizhen, Empress Xiaozhuangrui, and Empress Xiaosu.

description.zh-cn: 明英宗之子，明宪宗的异母弟，称受过钱太后的“抚育深恩”。
description.en: A son of Emperor Yingzong and half-brother of Emperor Xianzong, who claimed to have received 'deep nurturing grace' from Empress Dowager Qian.

description.zh-cn: 明代宗的原配皇后，在明英宗被软禁期间曾照顾过钱皇后。
description.en: The original empress of the Jingtai Emperor, who took care of Empress Qian during Emperor Yingzong's house arrest.

description.zh-cn: 明仁宗的皇后，明宣宗的母亲，明英宗的祖母。她与孙太后一同册立钱氏为皇后。
description.en: Empress of Emperor Renzong, mother of Emperor Xuanzong, and grandmother of Emperor Yingzong. She, along with Empress Dowager Sun, selected Lady Qian to be the empress.

description.zh-cn: 今江苏省连云港市，为孝庄睿皇后的出身地。
description.en: Modern-day Lianyungang, Jiangsu Province, the birthplace of Empress Xiaozhuangrui.

description.zh-cn: 明朝的最高军事机构之一。
description.en: One of the highest military bodies in the Ming dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 明朝的皇帝禁卫军和秘密警察机构。
description.en: The imperial bodyguard and secret police agency of the Ming dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 正统七年，钱氏被册立为明英宗的皇后，夫妻感情甚笃。
description.en: In 1442, Lady Qian was made Empress of Emperor Yingzong, and they shared a very close relationship.

description.zh-cn: 朱见潾称钱太后对他有“抚育深恩”。
description.en: Zhu Jianlin claimed that Empress Dowager Qian had shown him 'deep nurturing grace'.

description.zh-cn: 明英宗在土木堡之变中被瓦剌俘虏。
description.en: Emperor Yingzong was captured by the Oirats during the Tumu Crisis.

description.zh-cn: 钱钦在土木堡之变中随驾而死。
description.en: Qian Qin died accompanying the emperor in the Tumu Crisis.

description.zh-cn: 钱钟在土木堡之变中随驾而死。
description.en: Qian Zhong died accompanying the emperor in the Tumu Crisis.

description.zh-cn: 在明英宗被俘后，钱皇后因日夜哭泣导致一腿残疾、一目失明。
description.en: After Emperor Yingzong was captured, Empress Qian's constant crying led to a crippled leg and blindness in one eye.

description.zh-cn: 在土木堡之变中俘虏了明英宗。
description.en: Captured Emperor Yingzong in the Tumu Crisis.

description.zh-cn: 明英宗被迎回后，被其弟景泰帝幽禁于南宫。
description.en: After Emperor Yingzong was returned, he was placed under house arrest in the Southern Palace by his younger brother, the Jingtai Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 明英宗通过夺门之变复辟，重登皇位。
description.en: Emperor Yingzong was restored to the throne through the Duomen Coup.

description.zh-cn: 夺门之变导致景泰帝被废黜。
description.en: The Duomen Coup led to the deposition of the Jingtai Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 在钱太后逝世后，周太后违背英宗遗命，不愿让其与英宗合葬，并暗中作梗使二人同陵异穴。
description.en: After Empress Dowager Qian's death, Empress Dowager Zhou went against Emperor Yingzong's final wish, unwilling to let her be buried with him, and secretly arranged for them to be in separate burial chambers within the same tomb.

description.zh-cn: 为讨好周贵妃，传谕独尊其为皇太后，意图剥夺钱氏的同等地位，后被大学士李贤、彭时阻止。
description.en: To curry favor with Consort Zhou, he issued an edict to honor her as the sole Empress Dowager, attempting to strip Lady Qian of her equal status, but was stopped by Grand Secretaries Li Xian and Peng Shi.

description.zh-cn: 据理力争，确保了钱氏与周氏同尊为皇太后，并在钱太后逝后坚持其必须依英宗遗诏合葬裕陵。
description.en: Argued on the basis of principle to ensure both Lady Qian and Lady Zhou were honored as Empress Dowagers, and after Empress Dowager Qian's death, insisted that she must be buried with Emperor Yingzong in the Yuling Mausoleum according to his will.

description.zh-cn: 与李贤一同据理力争，确保了钱氏与周氏同尊为皇太后。
description.en: Together with Li Xian, argued on the basis of principle to ensure both Lady Qian and Lady Zhou were honored as Empress Dowagers.

description.zh-cn: 在英宗被幽禁南宫期间，时为景泰帝皇后的汪氏对钱皇后多有照拂。
description.en: During Emperor Yingzong's house arrest in the Southern Palace, Empress Wang, then the empress of the Jingtai Emperor, often looked after Empress Qian.

description.zh-cn: 英宗复辟后，钱皇后竭力保护被废为庶人的汪氏及其女儿，使其免被害。
description.en: After Emperor Yingzong's restoration, Empress Qian did her utmost to protect Wang, who had been demoted to a commoner, and her daughters from harm.

description.zh-cn: 与孙太后一同册立钱氏为皇后。
description.en: Together with Empress Dowager Sun, she selected Lady Qian to be the Empress.

description.zh-cn: 与张太皇太后一同册立钱氏为皇后。
description.en: Together with Grand Empress Dowager Zhang, she selected Lady Qian to be the Empress.

description.zh-cn: 逝世后祔葬于裕陵。
description.en: Was buried in the Yuling Mausoleum after her death.
